original_text: He carried to Babylon all the articles from the temple of God, both large and small, and the treasures of the Lord’s temple and the treasures of the king and his officials.
korean_text: 또 하나님의 전의 대소 그릇들과 여호와의 전의 보물과 왕과 방백들의 보물을 다 바벨론으로 가져가고

sentences.original_text: all the articles from the temple of God
and the treasures of the Lord's temple
and the treasures of the king and his officials
